title: Shadowheart

to increase Approval for Shadowheart in BG3

Shadowheart likes a reasonable or rational approach to problems, and she appreciates being private and respecting her privacy. Shadowheart is fond of animals, and showing appreciation towards animals will increase her approval, and being cruel to animals will decrease it. Shadowheart also appreciates actions that would benefit others. As a Sharran, Shadowheart approves of actions that are against Selune and the Church of Selune.
